name: EPICBOTS
description: EPICBOTS is a suite of AI infused Telegram Bots designed to bring Market Intelligence, Fun and Engagement Tools to 10,000's of Web3 communities. The EPICBOTS cover 2 main categories; Engagement Bots and Banger Bots. Banger Bots are laden with features that enhance the crypto experience for all user groups. Engagement Bots are specifically designed for community fun and engagement.
